reviews.review_msg: Horrible. No direction the entire class; vague comments on how to do assignments. When grades come back (at the end of the semester, not right when it's marked) you get a much lower mark than he lets off. Do not take.
I took two classes with Daivd on video production and found him very helpful, easy to approach and genuinely interested in my projects. He is very intelligent and a very nice man.

Stuart is a really genuine, great guy.  Really knowledgable and passionate about media literacy.  I don't know what those two were talking about before, but talk to him for 5 minutes and you can see that he knows his stuff.

The most caring and down to earth prof I had ever have. He cares about his students, and want every person in the class to learn and have a good experiences. One of the most underrated professor, I really wish he could get promoted and become better in future!

Roman is interesting, has clearly done a lot in his life. Drew complex material together in interesting ways. I took Power and Affect - best classes I've taken at SFU. Too bad they're not offered anymore! Very fun and casual. He appreciates intelligent students.

Graet course - I took both the POwer and Seduction/Fashion section... What you learn will not help you much with your other cmns courses, but it will come in priceless later on in life... And make sure you attend seminars, they are short and sweet.

I have taken 8 classes with Roman and I am a huge fan. Not only is he an excellent prof, he always incorporates life into his material. Each lecture (even the 3 hr ones) were ones I looked forward to every week. He gave me insight to life and cmns at a whole new level!

Roman is brilliant. Going to his lectures is like therapy in that they are a work of art and speak to the human heart. He has taught me more about education, media, myth, society, and life than anyone ever will. I respect everything he teaches as he speaks to and from the heart.Very knowledgable,approachable and relatable. Highly recommend!!!!

I took the Power course in the previous terms and just took the Design course, which was a lot tougher.  I learned more in these two courses than I did throughout most of my university career.  An awesome prof.  Highly recommended.
I am amazed at how much I learn from this guy. He intrigues me to no end. Wise guy! He must be the coolest prof I know! He knows his stuff, no bs! He has a different style of teaching though.
Best professor.  Ever.  He's a gem.

Roman's classes are very interesting and he teaches from the heart! He is very very knowledgeable and crystal clear on things. I enjoy every class I think with him and actually learned alot about many things; life, history...etc.

Ok... I've taken 7 classes with Roman. He taught me more about life than anything else. His lectures prove to be so valuable outside of your academic life. It would be a shame if you don't get a chance to learn from someone like him. He's an easy marker, and he gives a lot of A's, but that's not why you should take his classes. He's the best.
Great Prof, approachable, understanding. Clear to those that bother to engage him. It's important to be "vulgar" sometimes too, and he does a good job of it.
Awesome prof, really fun topics, good discussions.
